name: initial_contact
template:
Hi {contact_name}, this is {agent_name} with {company_name}. 
                I noticed that {property_address} might be a great opportunity for {investment_strategy}. 
                Based on our analysis, {value_proposition}. 
                Would you be open to a brief conversation about this?

name: market_opportunity
template:
Hi {contact_name}, I'm reaching out because we've identified some interesting 
                market trends in {market_area}. Properties like yours at {property_address} are showing 
                {market_insight}. Given {timing_factor}, this could be an optimal time to consider 
                {suggested_action}. Would you like to discuss this further?
